reviews.title: dissapointed in compared to apple version
reviews.comment: the GUI of this android version of the app is clunky. too often the number of clicks to do the same task in the apple version is more thus anoying. not to mention the look of the buttons and GUI is lacking. comon guys spend some time on the GUI
reviews.author: Patrick Basten

reviews.title: Android version has problems
reviews.comment: I used this app for several years on my iPod touch, and when I got my HT Evo phone, it was one of the first things I put on it. It syncs with my iPad pretty well, but frequently the prices don\'t get synced (they show up as zero on the target device). The UI is a bit clunky, but that\'s pretty subjective. Periodically, it won\'t let me edit any prices. All in all, it is only one-star app. The bar code scanning feature invariably returns the wrong product, so it\'s useless. I emailed the author to ask a question... never got a reply.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its ok.
reviews.comment: Its free so csnt ask much. Been using it for about 6 monthis on my SG3 and so far  it does what I need it to.
reviews.author: W.Dannie Lane

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Why some times prices change on their own to $0.00 whats up with that?
reviews.author: Joseph Kubinec

reviews.title: \"Poor Cousin\" sums it perfectly
reviews.comment: We used this app on four iOS devices for a long time and LOVED it. It sync\'ed both our iPhones and iPads and was a joy to use.  Not so with the Android version. It\'s clunky and horrible in comparison. Searching ability is gone completely, making life too difficult with our 100+ item shopping list. I\'m sick of scrolling through everything to find an item to tick. It shouldn\'t be this hard and I\'ve had enough.  I\'m on the search for a replacement shopping list app today.
reviews.author: Gary Forsyth

reviews.title: Piece of s**t!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Does not work with the droid platform. I\'ve uninstalled and reinstalled it many times. When I try to add items, it finds them; but cannot select them. When it \"downloads from database\" it gets stuck at 1/100. Please recrate this app for the droid platform.
reviews.author: Diego Iturriaga

reviews.title: Should have listened to the reviews
reviews.comment: I downloaded the app hoping the reviews were isolated issues because this is one of the few apps that work on both Android and iOS that scans and takes pictures.  Well on my S3, the pics down\'t work.  It will take the pics and store the to the SD card root directory but not actually put them on the item.  I have to move the pic to the gallery folder and then go back in a reassign it.  Shame this does not work, I will have to keep looking for a good app.
reviews.author: Chris Delaney

reviews.title: Works great now
reviews.comment: Had iPhone version - a 5 star app. Now with sync issues addressed the Android version works great. I would like to however see easier editing capability when online changing items in the online portal. Also would like to see ability to zoom in on item images when accessing phone app...
reviews.author: Cyn Hin

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: Works for a few times then says jts loading data and it nevdr downloads pkease fix!
reviews.author: Anna Peden

reviews.title: No search?
reviews.comment: I can live without all the other functionality missing, that the iOS version has, but the search functionality is a must have.
reviews.author: Jan Cutrer

reviews.title: It is getting worse.
reviews.comment: Don\'t sync or take more than an hour to sync a few items. Crashes very often too!!!
reviews.author: Fong Lim

reviews.title: Freezes
reviews.comment: Won\'t stay running for more than 20 minutes. Can\'t get the shopping done let alone  preparing the shopping list. Wish it had a search somewhere in the program. Not even the desktop application works.
reviews.author: Bruce MacArthur

reviews.title: Nice App With A Few Bugs
reviews.comment: I love this app on my iPad, buy have been disappointed so far on my Galaxy Nexus.  The app syncs to my list initially, and works for a few days, but then it freezes up while updating and I have to delete my data and resync from scratch.  At least that process is fairly painless!  Correct the sync issues and it\'ll be a five star app.
reviews.author: Kristopher Hatcher

reviews.title: Poor Android Design
reviews.comment: This app works great on my friends iPhone. On android, not so much.
reviews.author: Eric Agena

reviews.title: Me
reviews.comment: Can\'t get scanner to work no matter what I do.
reviews.author: Carl Hopper

reviews.title: Works great for me, I love it!
reviews.comment: Don\'t understand the negative comments. I would suggest uninstalling then checking for phone software upgrades then reinstalling. I have Android 4.1.1 jelly bean on my galaxy S3. Once I entered my group name and password I had my entire shopping list. I already have it on 2 iPhones and an iPad. Great app, didn\'t mind paying for it again for the Android phone.
reviews.author: David Deninger

reviews.title: Not recommended
reviews.comment: This app constantly shuts down. It also looses my entries. I have entered the items I regularly purchase multiple times only to come back and find them missing again.
reviews.author: Eva-Maria Robins

reviews.title: Don\'t bother
reviews.comment: I had this app on my iPhone and it was great. The android version is very hard to use in comparison. Until they update it don\'t bother.
reviews.author: Marc Nicolle
